property.description: Top moveslot

property.description: HP EV (stat experience)

property.description: Bottom moveslot

property.name: playerId
property.description: The active player user Id, better tracking for if the game has loaded a new or saved game

property.name: starterPokemon
property.description: The starter Pokemon received from Oak.

property.name: joypadSimulation
property.description: Setting this to true will disable collision for your character.

property.name: joypadIgnore
property.description: Buttons to ignore in the joypad (bit mask). Each button corresponds to the following bits: A Button: bit 0 (0x01, dec 1), B Button: bit 1 (0x02, dec 2), Select: bit 2 (0x04, dec 4), Start: bit 3 (0x08, dec 8), D-Pad Right: bit 4 (0x10, dec 16), D-Pad Left: bit 5 (0x20, dec 32), D-Pad Up: bit 6 (0x40, dec 64), D-Pad Down: bit 7 (0x80, dec 128). Example values: 0x00: no input is ignored (all buttons are processed), 0xFF: every button is ignored (no player input), 0xFC: only A and B are allowed

property.name: countPlayTime
property.description: play time being counted

property.name: debugMode
property.description: Only set by the debug build. If true: [detailed description omitted for brevity]

property.name: flyOrDungeon
property.description: the target warp is a fly warp (bit 3 set or blacked out) or a dungeon warp (bit 4 set)

property.name: forceBike
property.description: currently being forced to ride bike (cycling road)

property.name: destinationIsBlackout
property.description: map destination is [wLastBlackoutMap] (usually the last used pokemon center, but could be the player's house)

property.name: trashCanPuzzle
property.description: Set value to 3 to solve the puzzle. Freezing this property breaks the gym trainers.

property.name: lass19
property.description: check trainer number

property.name: animationTurn
property.description: This dictates which direction battle animations are played. (Enemy attacking player, or player attacking enemy.)

property.name: lowHealthAlarm
property.description: This is set to 0 at the start of battle and 1 when the opponent has lost

property.name: attackDamage
property.description: Amount of damage attack is about to do. Max possible damage may appear one frame before actual damage.

property.name: hp
property.description: The Player's active Pokemon's current HP

property.name: maxHp
property.description: The Player's active Pokemon's max HP

property.name: attack
property.description: The Player's active Pokemon's Attack stat as calculated in battle (badge boosts and stat modifications included

property.name: defense
property.description: The Player's active Pokemon's Defense stat as calculated in battle (badge boosts and stat modifications included

property.name: speed
property.description: The Player's active Pokemon's Speed stat as calculated in battle (badge boosts and stat modifications included

property.name: special
property.description: The Player's active Pokemon's Special stat as calculated in battle (badge boosts and stat modifications included

property.name: battleStatSpeed
property.description: The Player's active Pokemon's Speed stat as calculated in battle (badge boosts and stat modifications included

property.name: battleStatSpecial
property.description: The Player's active Pokemon's Special stat as calculated in battle (badge boosts and stat modifications included

property.name: battleStart
property.description: When 0 battle is starting, when >=1 battle has begun

property.name: trainerDefeated
property.description: When 1, the opponent has lost

property.name: name
property.description: The rival's name.

property.name: channel1
property.description: When 1, the opponent has lost

property.description: When 1, the opponent has lost

property.name: textSpeed1
property.description: Fast text speed is set when both 1 and 2 are set to false

property.name: textSpeed2
property.description: Fast text speed is set when both 1 and 2 are set to false

property.name: textSpeedMid
property.description: Fast text speed is set when both Mid and Slow are set to false

property.name: textSpeedSlow
property.description: Fast text speed is set when both Mid and Slow are set to false

entry.value: Fast Text, No Animations, Battlestyle Set
